statements: DELETE FROM concert_tickets WHERE concert_name = 'Rock Concert';
DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE section_id = 2 AND seat_number = 'A15'
DELETE FROM ticket_prices WHERE concert_id = 100 AND ticket_type = 'VIP';
DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_occupied = TRUE AND section_id = 500;
DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE arrangement_id IN (SELECT arrangement_id FROM seating_arrangements WHERE seat_number = 10);
DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE ticket_id = 101 AND section = 'VIP';
DELETE FROM ticket_prices WHERE concert_name = 'Rock Concert';
DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = false AND section = 'Front' AND seat_number < 10;
DELETE FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 100.00 AND section = 'VIP';
